User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Received a mail message containing an attached file called "paper.mht". I clicked the "save" button in the bottom right hand corner of the window. I create a new folder on my desktop or use an existing folder for the destination of the file. 


Actual results:

Thunderbird appears to save the file (there is a progress bar). But the folder remains empty.


Expected results:

The file should have appeared in the folder.
